body.copy: Graduated from the University of Nebraska with a degree in Mechanical Engineering in 2014.
Honed my engineering mindset as a Manufacturing Engineer for six years in carbon fiber winding and recreational vehicle industries.
Wrote my own programs to automate manufacturing processes utilizing programmable logic controller (PLCs).
Attended Glavanize/Hack Reactor Immersive Software Engineering Program from February 2020 - May 2020. This is a full time, 12 hours per day, six days per week, 13 week program.
I've continued to learn new technologies and have been seeking out employment opportunities. Most recently, I worked as a contract software engineer at Giide to create their homepage website.
